# Day 1 {#sec:day1}

Basics of ageing

Peter Comeau gave a presentation on the history and realities of age estimation of marine organims.

Julie Davies gave an overview of the age estimation activities that she is involved in, in her role as lab manager for DTU Aquqa qand also through her chairing WKSMART and WKBIOP.


Stephen Wichnoiski shared his experience of running an age estimation laboratory at the Pacific Biological Station and being involved in the COmmunity of Age Reading Experts (CARE) .


Tracey and Rick Rideout presented their work on estimating ages of Greenland Halibut.
